extendedInfo.description: The Three Little Pigs is an educational application designed for children, with a graphic concept that urges them to discover different elements of interaction in each slide.In the category stories for children, under the brand 'tales box', The Three Little Pigs is designed so that it does not scare the little ones, including the adaptation scenario and graphics. The characters are designed so that children will cherish this wonderful Romanian story.Interactive elements urges to discover animal sounds and objects.App includes:- An Interactive story The Three Little Pigs- Ads- A memory game developed on multiple levels(DEMO)- A drawing game(DEMO)- A game for filling images(DEMO)- A puzzle based on the drawings of the story(DEMO)- Possibility to download "The Three Little Pigs Pro" with games(FULL VERSION of games)- Possibility to download other stories under the brand 'tales box' (SOON)Tales box, Romanian and international stories for children.More details on: www.talesbox.comLanguage: English(United States)
